availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, naive. Attended Transylvania University in Lexington, Kentucky. Attorney in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Colonel of the 23rd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment from January 1862 to October 1, 1862. Detached as commander of the post of Louisville, Kentucky, in the District of Western Kentucky of the Department of the Ohio from October 1862 to December 1863. Resigned on December 31, 1863.

ab.bibl: Roger D. Hunt, Colonels in Blueâ€”Indiana, Kentucky and Tennessee: A Civil War Biographical Dictionary (Jefferson, N.C.: McFarland, 2014), 180.
